feed.title: Metabase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase 52.15
entry.content:
Upgrading

Before you upgrade, back up your Metabase application database!

Check out our upgrading instructions.

Get the most out of Metabase. Learn more about advanced features, managed cloud, and first-class support.

Metabase Open Source

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.52.15.x JAR download: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.52.15.x/metabase.jar

Metabase Enterprise

Docker image: metabase/metabase-enterprise:v1.52.15.x JAR download: https://downloads.metabase.com/enterprise/v1.52.15.x/metabase.jar

Changelog

Enhancements

Embedding: updates for React 19 support

  • React-draggable compatibility issue with react 19 (#54901)
  • Upgrade react-virtualized to 9.22.5 (#54645)
  • Upgrade react-grid-layout to 1.4.4 (#54644)
  • Replace findDOMNode in core components (#54650)
  • fix(sdk): remove react-router console error in LegendLabel when in React 19 (#54926)
  • fix(sdk): mark react-dom/client as external to fix warnings in React 19 (#54919)

Embedding

  • Convert RulePreview component to Mantine (#54472)
  • Convert RuleListing component ****to Mantine (#54471)
  • Convert RuleDescription component ****to Mantine (#54470)
  • fix(sdk): Fix ColorRangeSelector in Conditional Formatting (#54450)
  • Convert components of RuleEditor to Mantine (#54104)

Other

  • Conditional formatting glitches with color picker and dropdown behavior (#54483)

Bug fixes

Database

  • Date fields are cast to datetime in Oracle, preventing index usage (#53371)

Querying

  • Breakout and drill-down fail on native models with renamed columns (#53556)

Other

  • updated_at timestamps of cards, dashboards and pulses are updated upon view (#53687)
  • New user notifications sent to API key email addresses (#54347)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase 53.6
entry.content:
Upgrading

Before you upgrade, back up your Metabase application database!

Check out our upgrading instructions.

Get the most out of Metabase. Learn more about advanced features, managed cloud, and first-class support.

Metabase Open Source

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.53.6.x JAR download: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.53.6.x/metabase.jar

Metabase Enterprise

Docker image: metabase/metabase-enterprise:v1.53.6.x JAR download: https://downloads.metabase.com/enterprise/v1.53.6.x/metabase.jar

Changelog

Enhancements

Embedding

  • React-draggable compatibility issue with react 19 (#54902)
  • [SDK] Improve _.compose type + fix SDK type (#54850)

Querying

  • Increase stage limit to 1000 and clarify error message. (#54917)
  • Auto formatting updates visualization based on currency style changes (#54349)

Database

  • Stop fingerprinting on DB connection failure (#54697)
  • Improve permission updates for large schemas (#54858)

Other - ARM-compatible docker images now available (#54473) - Load correct map tiles for pin map visualizations (#54475) - Allow impersonated users to hit cache again (#54521) (#54673) - Improved site URL input padding (#54536) - Update columns after appending data to upload models (#54069)

Bug fixes

Administration

  • Single Logout (SLO) Fails when using Okta (#46605)

Database

  • Athena connection fails without specified region (#53346) ****(#42671)

Organization

  • CSV upload dropdown fails in append data modal (#53824)
  • Saving questions to dashboard fails without root collection permission (#54573)

Querying

  • datetimeDiff function fails for DATE columns with DAY granularity (#54654)
  • datetimeDiff Does Not Support Milliseconds as a Unit (#54449)
  • Date filter does not close on ESC (#54353)
  • Date range filter with a ‘Starting from’ cannot be displayed as a custom expression (#54146)
  • Overwriting card with recursive query does not display error message(#53404)
  • Native query parameter throws TypeError when made required (#52812)
  • Native query parameters remain in URL after leaving editor (#52806)
  • SQL view is opened when creating a question on small screens (#48170)
  • Fix card creation and dashboard permissions handling (#54292)

Visualization

  • Large inputs on text filters will add a scroll bar on the page to the right (#44435)
  • Between dashboard filter fails with partial input (#54364)
  • Chart tooltips now display correctly in dashcards (#54614)
  • Raw data and table data sections remain visible after joining tables (#34734)
  • Undefined in the URL when click behavior target filter gets removed in a dashboard (#35444)
  • Moving columns in model metadata resets table view (#41419)
  • Text overflowing in relative datepicker dropdown (#52090)
  • Unwired filters appear in subscriptions, causing confusion (#46087)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase 52.16
entry.content:
Upgrading

Before you upgrade, back up your Metabase application database!

Check out our upgrading instructions.

Get the most out of Metabase. Learn more about advanced features, managed cloud, and first-class support.

Metabase Open Source

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.52.16.x JAR download: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.52.16.x/metabase.jar

Metabase Enterprise

Docker image: metabase/metabase-enterprise:v1.52.16.x JAR download: https://downloads.metabase.com/enterprise/v1.52.16.x/metabase.jar

Changelog

Enhancements

Embedding

  • fix(sdk): Add template strings to Breakout and Filter (#55150)
  • feat(sdk): Add stable IDs for SaveQuestion / InteractiveQuestion (#55024)
  • Change name of files from Result -> DefaultView (#55014)
  • Convert cardId to questionId for consistency (#55013)
  • fix(sdk): Popovers not working on Safari (#55012)
  • feat(sdk): Ensure that all dashboards use entity ID the same way (#55010)
  • feat(sdk): Add entity IDs to CollectionBrowser (#54985)
  • feat(sdk): Add stable ID support where missing (#54975)
  • refactor(sdk): Add targetCollection and deprecate saveToCollection (#54971)
  • make sdk not error on type error (#54964)
  • feat(sdk): experimental react 19 version range support (#54904)
  • Backport: "Run cypress tests against sample apps" (#54862)
  • Replace defaultProps in styled and functional components (#54725)
  • feat(sdk): Add DownloadWidget and DownloadWidgetDropdown (#54546)

Other

  • Don't allow a migrate down if you are running an old version of metabase (#54984)
  • Don't update dashboard updated_by if only last_viewed_at changes (#54613)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase 53.7
entry.content:
Upgrading

Before you upgrade, back up your Metabase application database!

Check out our upgrading instructions.

Get the most out of Metabase. Learn more about advanced features, managed cloud, and first-class support.

Metabase Open Source

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.53.7.x JAR download: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.53.7.x/metabase.jar

Metabase Enterprise

Docker image: metabase/metabase-enterprise:v1.53.7.x JAR download: https://downloads.metabase.com/enterprise/v1.53.7.x/metabase.jar

Changelog

Enhancements

Dashboards

  • Do not copy actions when duplicating a dashboard (#55197)

Performance

  • More efficient queries for anonymous execution stats (#55126, #54932)
  • Optimize post-processing of MongoDB queries (#54881)
  • Small pivot table performance improvements (#54555)

Other

  • Improve query logging for database syncs (#55039)
  • Fix React console errors on unrecognized props in styled components (#55081)
  • Override type of date fields for ClickHouse upload tables (#55209)
  • Add sdk embedding setting information to anonymous stats (#54988)
  • Add settings information to anonymous stats (#54981)
  • Google Sheets Integration - Feature Branch (#51436)

Bug fixes

Administration

  • Error when logging in using Azure Entra ID (#55007)

Querying

  • Redshift average returns integer values for integer columns (#48173)
  • Stale filter input state shown when resetting or clearing the value (#46177)
  • Changing database in native query editor does not remove Field filters connected to old Database (#31926)

Visualizations

  • Chart visualization error when changing from 2 metrics to 1 metric on a saved question with chart with 2 axis (#54755)
  • Drill Through on Datetimes fail for Questions based on SQL Questions (Grouped by Day) (#54108)
  • Pie charts don't handle drillthrough on (empty) slices correctly (#49737)

Reporting

  • Alerts that fail to run are marked as success in task-history (#54495)
  • Incorrect timezone name when downloading results (#7388)

Other

  • Wrong padding of field name in Model metadata editing (#54898)

entry.title: New release for Metabase: Metabase 53.8
entry.content:
Upgrading

Before you upgrade, back up your Metabase application database!

Check out our upgrading instructions.

Get the most out of Metabase. Learn more about advanced features, managed cloud, and first-class support.

Metabase Open Source

Docker image: metabase/metabase:v0.53.8.x JAR download: https://downloads.metabase.com/v0.53.8.x/metabase.jar

Metabase Enterprise

Docker image: metabase/metabase-enterprise:v1.53.8.x JAR download: https://downloads.metabase.com/enterprise/v1.53.8.x/metabase.jar

Changelog

Enhancements

Embedding

  • localhost:* is removed from the authorized origins when another origin is added (#55478)
  • Update embedding team codeowners files (#55317)
  • refactor: Make embedding selector names consistent (#55260)

Querying

  • fix(qb): do not cut layout with two sidebars (#55163)
  • refactor: rework filter widget to typescript (#54916)

Other

  • support: Add snowplow logging for starburst-legacy-impersonation (#55569)
  • feat: add embedding stats to token request (#55491)
  • docs(sdk): Update SDK version to 0.53.12 (#55466)
  • Revert "Shared FE/BE pivots" (#53000) in 53 (#55458)
  • backport #55127 (#55407)
  • upgrade snowflake driver (#55338)
  • Fix temporal string definitions (#55270)
  • loki-update should update only diff (#55246)
  • [sync-metadata] Use equalsIgnoreCase to match fields instead of lowercasing (#55239)
  • minor modal message fix (#55217)
  • Add constraints to key (#55211)
  • Store created-by-id in the gsheets config (#55191)
  • feat: add malli schema, test converage to ldap api (#55130)
  • Polishing 2025: Improve spacing in Admin / Settings / Appearance / Logo (#55122)
  • Polishing 2025: Fix width of model persistence toggle (#55121)
  • Avoid ref on fn component error in console (#54959)
  • Fix static viz to respect custom formatting (#54154)
  • Fix frontend parsing of allowed iframe hosts (#54111)
  • Update root folder Dockerfile (#54110)
  • Remove unused cards in usage analytics (#53598)
  • Auto re-run only failed e2e tests in CI (#51359)

Bug fixes

Administration

  • New tables/views or fields are not syncing in Snowflake (#55497)
  • App partially crashes during navigation (#55162)
  • Metabase should run field value scanning on Metabase analytics views (#46540)

Embedding

  • Area Charts in Static Embed (and embed Preview) don't load Properly (#53713)

Operation

  • Serialization won't work with dashboards that have a time grouping filter (#54941)

Organization

  • App crashes when editing segment field details in data reference (#55322)

Querying

  • Navigation issue when navigating back to a model (#55158)
  • Dragging to zoom in chart sometimes has end time before start time (#53724)
  • Prevent browser close/go back while changes are unsaved (#32037)

Reporting

  • If all questions in the dashboard have normal template tags, you can't use parameters in subscriptions (#55205)
  • Average, Distinct values are aggregated as Sum for subtotals and grand total in the CSV export (#54496)
  • Custom column will render all decimals when left as default (#31405)

Visualization

  • Can't change back to dollar sign in header (#54728)
  • Tooltip overflow on charts with many data points (no scrolling available) (#53586)
  • Waterfall metric viz setting should not have a color selector (#50801)
  • Tooltip gets super long and cut off when lots of series in "Other" (#48347)
  • charts don't use whitelabeled colors in subscriptions (#47644)
  • Is not null condition shows incorrectly on Slack (#34904)
  • Scientific Number display incorrect (#25222)
  • Pin Maps with more than 1000 results (LeafletTilePinMap) not working with FK latitude/longitude fields (#9421)

Other

  • hitting logout endpoint throws an error if not logged in (#55457)
  • Pivot Grand Totals Incorrect if Aggregate Column Name Contains Special Characters (#55415)

Under the Hood

Embedding

  • test(sdk): Perform type-checking of Embedding SDK CLI snippets (#54972)
